Description:
Required skills to be successfulMust have experience in procurement & pricing for special logistics, full and partial Charter movements, Out of Gauge, and projects.
Should be well-versed with Ocean Freight market intelligence, carrier relations and thoroughly knowledgeable about the ocean services to/from Middle East.
Proficiency in overall Ocean Freight, Cross Border and Local Services Management. 
Thorough knowledge about GCC customs and border regulations, Freezones in UAE and neighboring markets.  About the teamThe role will report to the Operations Manager. You will be working in a dynamic and busy environment wherein you will be dealing directly with different Stakeholders across the organization. What equips you for the roleDegree or Diploma preferably in Supply Chain or Logistics
At least 5-7 years in procurement in Ocean and land Freight Industry, preferably worked with leading MNC forwarders
Pricing / Ocean Freight Procurement / Tender management skills
Must have experience in procurement & pricing for special logistics, full and partial Charter movements, Out of Gauge, and projects.
Understanding to ATA Carnet processes, Exhibition Shipment clearances and special logistics 
Should be well versed with Free Zone regulations, MOFAIC, customs processes and Incoterms
Should be able work under pressure & must be flexible in working hours. Job Details
